details.author: MainAgent
details.text:
```json
{
  "selected_agents": [
    "WebSearchAnalyst",
    "MainAgent"
  ],
  "keywords": [
    "Samsung Electronics",
    "latest news",
    "summary",
    "Slack post"
  ],
  "reason": "The WebSearchAnalyst will find the latest news article, the MainAgent will summarize the article and post it to Slack."
}
```
